website_summaries.verdict: Plantronics' BackBeat GO 3 Bluetooth earphones lack the sort of bass response needed to keep up with today's in-ear wireless options.
pros: Optional carrying pouch with backup battery

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is terrible. It sounds like the cheapest earphones you could buy, and there is zero base. Plus, the different sized earbuds all feel sharp in my ear. Look elsewhere. Not at all worth the price. It seems they focused more on the charging bag than anything else, and even that has the shortest USB wire.
customer_reviews.author: Rynn

customer_reviews.title: it's definitely my favorite headphone, connect to 3 of my computers as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so far my third headphone from Plantronics, it's definitely my favorite headphone, connect to 3 of my computers as well as my cellphone and ipad, switch with one tap, sound quality is good. Battery last reasonable amount of time after I've been use it everyday(almost) for past 2 year.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Received this last night and they would not power on, not even after a full night charging. I’ve always like Plantronics as a brand, so this just leaves me disappointed... I am returning this item for a refund and will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: EDGD

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones and a more than reasonable price tag!
customer_reviews.text: Great little headphones, charging case is very convenient, Plantronics makes great products when it comes to headphones. I also have back beat pro 2, and they are also awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gindling

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Recieved today...battery dead so charged for 4 hours...will not power on. Would give zero stars if I could... Update: note that the third party vendor did not pay return postage for this dead on arrival item...
customer_reviews.author: Star Wars Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headset I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas gift three years ago. They recently started loosing battery life fast. Not surprising because I use them EVERY day at work. I tried to buy a similar headset and was very disappointed. These Plantronics are the best Bluetooth headphones out there!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny 75

customer_reviews.title: Convient, discreet, mediyum Fidelity earbuds
customer_reviews.text: you will need to experiment with the multiple size ear buds to find a comfortable fit. The sound quality is less than I expected. Verey convenient and easy to operate switching from music to phone and back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Fell Out For Me
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine. Tried all the ear fitment pieces and none of them worked to stay in while running. Went back to my Plantronics BackBeat Fit Wireless Headphones....
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Maybe this specific item has sound problems
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product because the sound is not clear. I had another model from the same manufacturer and the sound was good but it was too short to keep on my neck.
customer_reviews.author: El Malo

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great and the battery lasts him for approx 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 23 year old son's birthday. The sound is great and the battery lasts him for approx 6 hours. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are durable. Amazing sound. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: 908ikhyuhh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly light and I was amazed at the battery life and how it informed me of how long the battery will last when I activate the product
customer_reviews.author: Rick Luif

customer_reviews.title: Poor call quality
customer_reviews.text: Call quality is simply unacceptable, in both what comes out of the microphone and what you are hearing. This could be a form factor limitation - most small headsets like this that I've tried seem to have these issues. I had to return Plantronics Fit, which sounded the same.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones
customer_reviews.text: They have an average sound, not so bassy as I would like, battery last depending on the volume level, they are a good.
customer_reviews.author: Sovcali

customer_reviews.title: there must be better out there
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is OK but I find even walking along with phone in my pocket, the headphones don't make continual contact with regular drop outs which really negates the whole wireless idea, there must be better out there? Perhaps the next edition will be better?!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Just loud enough to drowned out every thing around you.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wireless ear buds for all-day listening
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed with these BackBeat Go 3 ear buds. I had the opportunity to test the BackBeat Go 2 before and this new generation is a very nice improvement. More stable, better fit and once you have found which of the 3 ear tip sizes gives you the best seal, the audio quality is stellar, giving you a rich, deep natural sound. Not sure I would hit the road or do super intense workouts with these, but for an all-day pair of buds I can use in my commute, during my breaks or even at the gym, Back Beat Go 3 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Altosman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set, great sound, great customer service from Plantronics
customer_reviews.text: Great set, installs and operates on all devices including Laptops. Clear sound and extraordinary noise cancelling with three ear bud tip sizes. Plantronics even sent a fourth set of ear bud tips for free to ensure perfect fitting.
customer_reviews.author: GJM

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried all three earpiecec. Could not keep in my ear, kept falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall the sound wasn't bad, but I wasn't a fan of the earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Overall the sound wasn't bad, but I wasn't a fan of the earbuds. They didn't stay in my ear very well and a few of the earbud sizes muted the sound so much that it wasn't great. The biggest area of opportunity for these is simply the comfort and keeping them in my ears without me pushing them back in often. I wound up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Porter

customer_reviews.title: Tried them all, These are the best in my book.
customer_reviews.text: After trying many pairs of bluetooth earbuds (Jaybird, Rowkin, Beats, etc) I finally found the pair that I believe is the best buy for the money. Great sound, awesome battery life and clear calls make these a geat choice!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: but disappointed that no generic case or pouch was included
customer_reviews.text: i didn't get the charging case version, but disappointed that no generic case or pouch was included. otherwise, work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaws Revenge

customer_reviews.title: Quality is really bad! The woth headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound like coming from the sink. I would necer buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: ALINA Z

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and performance
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the best performing earbuds for the money. I have a pair of Bose and my girlfriend has JBL’s. These sound better than the JBL and just as good as the Bose. Unless you’re a professional audiophile these are great for normal use. I bought them at a Big box store for a better price than online.
customer_reviews.author: Mikal

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good even for heavy metal and classical music. It is light weight enough to be comfortable with extended wear. The ear tips are a bit awkward to remove and replace and I wish the wing stabilizers were replaceable with different sizes. Worth Every Penny. I absolutely love the charging case/pouch after a long period of music playing. They really do get close to 8 hours before needing a charge from the pouch but that only takes about 2 hours. You can also charge the puch while charging the earbuds (I do that at night). I also own the Jaybirds x2 and I would say they are both Great.
customer_reviews.author: Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and connection are excellent. I generally find myself using one of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is vastly improved over the previous iteration. The biggest improvement is in the fit and ability to stay in which helps maintain the improved sound. Battery life and connection are excellent. I generally find myself using one of my other pairs for workouts, but these work quite well for any use. I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: gary westling

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have very small ears and these have been the best so far when it comes to staying in place and sound quality. The only two downfalls so far are: replacement earbuds aren't easy to find for purchase and while at work, my coworkers have been making a game of sneaking up on me to scare me because they know I can't hear anything when I have these on.
customer_reviews.author: Fntstc_Lo

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster.
customer_reviews.text: Believe the PCMag review. These headphones if you are use to full sound these are not it. Lack bass. May try to contact company to try extra large ear pieces. Otherwise i would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Odeo

customer_reviews.title: Rubber tips fall off
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones with mediocre sound quality. Build quality is good, however the rubber tips are detachable and will fall off when you pull them out of your pocket, even out of your ear!! I’ve had to buy 3 extra pairs of rubber tips because mine keep falling off. I would not expect this from a 70 dollar product and will be looking for a new pair of Bluetooth earbuds soon.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Petric

customer_reviews.title: Ear hook
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice for an ear hook to be included because these continuously fall out my ears while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Braden King

customer_reviews.title: they have amazing deal for these
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy these from amazon but got it today from Costco, they have amazing deal for these... wonderful sound, fits well... liked them very much as they come with the carrying case that has additional battery charger... still have to test sound n mic quality...
customer_reviews.author: ViRAG

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones and out of the box the eartip broke when I was replacing the size and a part got stuck in the device. Customer service was not helpful from the brand and unwilling to replace the part. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, comfort and battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love the Backbeat Go 3! I can wear them all day without any discomfort. The sounds is amazing. I have always used Plantronics and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: These earbuds sound and feel great! They also stay in your ears well when ...
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound and feel great! They also stay in your ears well when running.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: horrendous sound. You need to literally jamb it all the way in your ear to get it right and that hurts too much. otherwise sound is like a tin can. my pt legend sounds better
customer_reviews.author: Hy H.

customer_reviews.title: which pair fine to any other WORKING bluetooth device
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth connection does not work. It does not pair with my devices, which pair fine to any other WORKING bluetooth device. They fall out easily. I am thoroughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Rabinowitz

customer_reviews.title: Garbage earbuds. Would give 0 stars if
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay in ears. Garbage earbuds. Would give 0 stars if able
customer_reviews.author: Troy Emge

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these locally then returned them. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these locally then returned them. They are only Bluetooth version 3.0. Says so right on the back of the box. They are using old technology. The standard Bluetooth in 2016 is version 4.0, which has been used for years already. Even cheap $30 earbuds are using 4.0 We will start seeing some ear buds with Bluetooth version 5.0 soon.

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat GO 3 - Wireless Headphones - Cobalt Black
product_meta.description: Color:Cobalt BlackExperience music like never before with BackBeat GO 3 Bluetooth® earbuds—designed for stunning audio quality, revealing the rich texture and micro-detail you’ve been missing. Its comfort-fit eartips stay put even when you don’t, sealing in sound and blocking out noise. With up to 6.5 hours of non-stop listening and a sweatproof coating, you can keep the music going, wherever your day takes you.
feature_bullets: Wireless Earbuds with High-Resolution Sound: Custom speakers and tuning deliver vivid, high-resolution sound, while the earbuds block out noise and seal in a rich listening experience.
Stable, Comfort-Fit Eartips: We 3D-mapped the human ear to create comfort-fit eartips that stay put even when you don’t.
Sweatproof: A nano-coating by P2i protects the earbuds from light rain, humidity, and sweat.
Wireless Control: Convenient inline controls let you adjust volume, skips tracks, take a quick call, or ask your smartphone to play a favorite playlist.
Long Lasting Battery Life: Up to 6.5 hours of non-stop listening so you can put your favorite playlist on repeat.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars54 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
